pullRequest.title: JBPM-9165 - Stunner - Global / Process variables allow empty value as data type
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/JBPM-9165
This removes the empty value from the data type combo box and uses the value "Object" as the default value.
Business-Central
VS Code Extension

nodes.bodyText: really minor improvement I see here, maybe instead of using the literal you can use Object.class.getSimpleName(), so we can rely on typed code this way...
same here, I would prefer avoid use of literals
